data.title: Excellent NY style Pizza and also great Spaghetti Bolognese
data.text: Went there during a trip to South Florida. Relatively small place but clean and modern. Pizza tasted fantastic as did the Spaghetti.. Just the way NY style Pizza should be.. Their tomato pizza sauce is awesome!! Service was friendly and fast. Will be back there at my next visit to South Florida.

data.title: Great Pizza
data.text: If you want a pizza with a thin crispy crust with generous toppings then you should dine here! They serve by the slice or regular pizza size offerings. The pasta dishes are huge portions with enough to take home for a second meal. It is a small place with seating inside or outside. The staff has been working there for years and they know how to keep their customers happy and coming back. It is a clean, quick place to eat before heading out to the Broward Performing Arts Center or other entertainment venues that are close by.

data.title: A Hidden Gem - The Best Pizza in Fort Lauderdale
data.text: This place is hidden in a strip mall adjacent to a CVS drugstore, do not let it scare you away. We were served one of the best pizza we have ever had in Florida. New York style but not some burnt cracker crust. Great flavors, good service and many more items to have beyond pizza. Do Not Miss This.

data.title: Empire of the week!
data.text: Freshly made pizza in Ft. Laud. Claims they are NY Style and it does not disappoint, attitude and all. But great pizza!!!

data.title: Stopped in for a quick lunch and it was very good.
data.text: I was on the run and just grabbed a slice with sausage and a drink for the road and it was very good.  I will definitely go back and dine in.  I thought the sausage was very good.  Friendly people and very fast service

data.title: Tasty pizza slices
data.text: We were passing by and didn't want to eat at any restaurant chain. We saw local policemen eating pizza in front of Empire and that's always a good sign :) Pizza slices were very tasty. I liked also the New York style decoration

data.title: rude workers. Including the manager
data.text: bad attitude I suppose ordering online may be ok but if talking to them in person is necessary watch out.  There are several pizza joints in the area that are happy to have your business.

data.title: Great Pizza! Fantastic oreo cheesecake
data.text: We visited here pre cruise.   Small place, very clean, very friendly staff. We were here late in the evening so it was not very packed.    Excellent pizza and FANTASTIC Oreo cheesecake.   Would absolutely eat here again if visiting Ft Lauderdale.

data.title: A little gem!
data.text: We stumbled upon this place when we were headed somewhere else. It's small but very friendly.  The pizza was great as was the cheesecake!  Beer....Ice cold.

data.title: We have ordered lunch from them and always loved it....now we had the pleasure of having them cater my son's party
data.text: I had a get together for my son's 21st bday and decided not to cook ... Best decision I ever made! I ended up ordering from Empire Pizza Café's catering menu as we have  eaten lunch there on several occasions and have always enjoyed and savored our experience.  The staff  as usual went over and beyond and were extremely patient and helpful!!  Most importantly the food was sinfully delicious! We had Penne Alla Vodka that was to die for, Eggplant Rollatini was spectacular, Penne, Broccoli & Chicken was superb, Chicken Francais was tender and tasty...and Chicken Parmagiana was delightful! We just moved to the east side of town.. so rest assured this will be our new hangout!

data.title: good pizza
data.text: good pizza but not what I expected as far as atmosphere inside.  Just a small pizza joint with self serve walk up counter…they bring out the pizza.  Food was great but could use a bit more in the way of atmosphere.

data.title: Excellent New York Style Pizza in FTL
data.text: This was a surprise and not even a first or second pick for us.   The pizza, bruschetta and cheese cake were all fresh and the service staff was amazing.   Had the feel of a NYC pizzeria but right in the posh area of Fort Lauderdale!   Excellent work guys!

data.title: Greasy spoon
data.text: This restaurant is great if you LOVE Italiuan greasy food.  I do sometimes, it really fills me up.  Their pizza slices are way bigger than their plates.

data.title: What's not to like about a fresh pie?
data.text: This place gets my vote for the town's best pizza joint for lunch or take-out. The crowed space for tables and noise make it miss points for dinner. You can get a slice from any of about five pies at any time or order your own. What I like is the thin crust and the fact it's never too salty. The veggie pizza is just great. Artichokes at no extra cost.

data.title: the Little things count.. They are out!!
data.text: I live across the street and actually love the food! But when ordering 2 cheesesteaks poolside and other things, ask for extra ketchup and they can't get that detail right, IM DONE!!.. $52.00 lunch. $8.00 tip and 3 ketchups.. So I march upstairs to get the ketchups as are cheesesteaks get cold!! Disgusted and done!!  If they read this.  Chuck Unit 615

data.title: Brits abroad love it.
data.text: We wanted a great pizza but with only 1 night at our condo to eat in we had to choose right. After a 5 hour drive we stopped at Empire and we were stunned by how good the pizza was. Friendly helpful staff and again the pizza was awesome. Really glad we found it.

data.title: Outstanding hidden gem in downtown Ft Lauderdale
data.text: Empire Pizza Cafe is one of the BEST places for pizza and casual italian food in Fort Lauderdale. They are conveniently located at Broward Blvd and US1 in the CVS plaza next door to Einsteins Bagels. Every single item I have tried has been delicious. They are a good bet for both lunch time and / or dinner. For lunch time, I have had their plain original pizza which is made NY style and is very good. I have also tried the Sicilian pizza, both of which are available by the slice. My parents actually became addicts of the sicilian pizza!! I also have tried the garden salad, stromboli, cheese ravioli and they have all been very good. Don't forget to save room for dessert because they also have a really good bread pudding!!

data.title: Muito Boa
data.text: Encontramos por acaso e resolvemos experimentar. A pizza do Empire foi a que mais gostamos de todas que comemos nos EUA. O lugar é bem legal também. Entramos um pouco antes do local fechar, mas fomos bem atendidos. Não colocam talheres na mesa, seu quiser é só pedir.

data.title: surpreendeu
data.text: um  pizaria bem aconchegante e pizza bem rápida, deferente do sabor brasileiro e italiano mas bem interessante   iria novamente por estava bem gostosa, ela fecha as 11h mas que quebra tem um farmácia CVS ao lados e que fica aberta 24h rsrsrs e lá farmácia não venda só remédios rsrs

data.title: Delicia
data.text: Pela proximidade do local em que estava estudando, Empire Pizza combinava boa comida e amniente agradavel. Com opções de pedir uma pizza inteira ou somente alguns pedaços, voce podera se sentir saciado!
